entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Occasional drifting snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Drifting snow. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
